displayName: Digihome 287 Full HD 43 Inch LED TV with Freeview HD
longDescription:
Whether you?re a movie buff or a soap addict you can enjoy all your favourites in vibrant, bold colour and perfect sound. The Digihome 278 Full HD LED TV is a great choice in any home for entertaining the whole family. Built-in Freeview ensures you can access a wealth of different kinds of media, all without subscription, and over 60 TV channels, 12 HD TV channels and 25 radio stations are yours without any monthly fee. If you want more channels, this is entirely possible with your chosen paid TV subscription or with one of the many digital TV streaming devices available.

Never miss a single detail in any of your favourite shows with 43 inches of Full HD 1080p resolution, guaranteeing authentic and vivid colours in every frame. This is further enhanced by a quality 1,200:1 contrast ratio, adding real depth. Watch from anywhere in the room as a viewing angle of 178 degrees means it doesn?t matter where you sit to watch; you?ll have a great view.

Crystal-clear audio

Whether you?re listening to your favourite radio station, film or TV series, you won?t miss a single word or note with quality Dolby Digital audio processing. The Digihome 278?s speaker system has 16W total power output and this is more than enough to ensure exceptional sound quality at whatever volume you choose, without distortion.

Connect to your Home network

Settle in for hours of gaming, box sets on Netflix (subscription required) or whatever you consider a great night in with your new and easy-to-connect 43-inch Digihome LED TV. 2 HDMI ports allow you to attach your games console, your digital TV box, Blu-ray player or any other HDMI-equipped device. Previous generations haven?t been forgotten either as there are SCART and USB ports allowing you to connect older devices, ideal for playback of compatible video, photo and audio files.

Energy efficient

Keep the bills under control and your eco-conscience clear with this black Digihome Full HD TV and its Grade A energy efficiency rating. It has an annual energy consumption of 75kWh which helps keep your electricity bills in check as well as being better for the environment than lower-rated televisions.
